Initial commit: BRASSFALL - Browser-based AK-47 shooting simulation

- Shooting targets that pop up behind obstacles
- Enhanced muzzle flash with sparks and debris
- Jumping and sprinting with FOV effects
- Full reload animation with metallic sounds
